name: The name of this strategy is "Create Crypto Portfolio"
Get benchmark
get benchmark last trade
Flow #1: Enter strategy information in the "set and store strategy variables function node
set and store portfolio and ticker variables
func:
// portfolio_id is set to unixtime
let d = Date.now() // use to dynamically assign id

let id = d
let tickers = ''
let name = "Create Crypto Portfolio"
let algotype = "interday"
let status = "running"
let trade_freq = 20
let sharpe = 0
let unixtime = 0
let benchmark = 'SPY'
let tickertype = 'crypto'
let account = 'paper'
let psize = 100000 // size of portfolio
let starting_balance = 0
let balance_today = 0
let ending_balance_today = 0
let balance_end = 0
let benchmark_start = 0
let benchmark_start_today = 0
let benchmark_current = 0
let benchmark_end_today = 0
let benchmark_end = 0
let gain_today_realized = 0
let gain_today_unrealized = 0
let pctgain_today = 0
let gainloss_realized = 0
let gainloss_unrealized = 0
let gainlosspct = 0
let benchmarkgain_today = 0
let benchmarkgain = 0
let benchmarkpct_today = 0
let benchmarkpct = 0


msg.id = id
msg.name = name
msg.trade = trade_freq
msg.status = status
msg.benchmark = benchmark
msg.account = account
msg.tickertype = tickertype
msg.psize = psize
msg.tickers = tickers

let sql = "replace into algo (id,name, tickers, algotype, status, trade_freq,sharpe,unixtime, portfolio,starting_balance,balance_today,ending_balance_today,balance_end,benchmark_start,benchmark_start_today,benchmark_current,benchmark_end_today,benchmark_end,gain_today_realized, gain_today_unrealized,pctgain_today,gainloss_realized,gainloss_unrealized,gainlosspct, benchmarkgain_today, benchmarkgain,benchmarkpct_today,benchmarkpct) values ('"
sql += id + "', '" + name + "','" + tickers + "','" + algotype + "', '" + status + "', '" + trade_freq + "','" + sharpe + "', '" + unixtime + "','" + psize + "','" + starting_balance + "', '" + balance_today + "','" + ending_balance_today + "','" + balance_end + "', '" + benchmark_start + "','" + benchmark_start_today + "','" + benchmark_current + "', '" + benchmark_end_today + "','" + benchmark_end + "','" + gain_today_realized + "', '" + gain_today_unrealized + "','" + pctgain_today + "','" + gainloss_realized + "', '" + gainloss_unrealized + "','" + gainlosspct + "','" + benchmarkgain_today + "', '" + benchmarkgain + "','" + benchmarkpct_today + "','" + benchmarkpct + "');"
msg.topic = sql
node.warn(msg.topic)


return msg;

name: get client order ids from portfolio
pass clientorderid
func:
let clientorderid = msg.payload["newclient_order_id"]
msg.clientid = clientorderid
node.warn("msg.clientid: " +msg.clientid)
return msg;

name: update portfolio
func:
let clientorderid = msg.payload["client_order_id"]
let clientid = msg.clientid

if ((clientorderid == clientid)) { // filled  only


let sql = "update portfolio SET  trade_profit = ((newfilled_qty * newfilled_price) - (filled_price * filled_qty)), benchmark_profit = (benchmark_end - benchmark_start) where newclient_order_id = '" + clientorderid + "';"

msg.topic = sql
node.warn(msg.topic)

return msg;
}
